TEXT.S: Corie Blount nalecuhan i Monrovia, California, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Corie Blount i 1993 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 25, namapili' tu nu Chicago Bulls putiput. 1 bulad 4 demiad, 1969 a mihca, Corie Blount, miunduay.
